title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.12 - Amendments and exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.12 - Amendments and exceptions

State Regulations
(a) Notwithstanding these regulations, should it, at any time, due to unique or
particular circumstances or considerations, be necessary in relation to a
particular project to except any methods, procedures or requirements of this

Part to the extent not inconsistent with law, such exception shall be submitted
to the State Director of the Budget for his approval prior to its
effectiveness. (b) Any and all
amendments, modifications or repeals of this Part, to the extent not
inconsistent with law, shall be submitted to the State Director of the Budget
for his approval prior to their effectiveness. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
